speakers.title: All About Water
speakers.name: Wanda Water
speakers.summary: Photographing only water may seem a tad, well, mono, but Wanda thinks about the unique ways to view water day and night. Wanda just can't get enough water. This program is sure to be a hit with the abstract crowd, but hydrophobes may want to give it a miss.
speakers.description:
Wanda's mother told her she was found underneath a rock on Vashon Island. She was convinced she had washed up from the sea, and has been fascinated by water ever since. You just can't get her away from water. Her hobbies include swimming, boating, kayaking, and diving. Wanda lives on a houseboat in Seattle.

Wanda has made a career out of photographing water. She specializes in nature close-ups, and other stuff, too. You really have to hear her speak. She puts on quite the show. Rain dance bioneers awareness kombucha morphic resonance goddess nudist papyrus font ecstatic dance, seventh generation gifting circle.
